WorkflowInfo.Name: Delete all mp3 files
WorkflowInfo.Description: Delete all mp3 files from specific folder
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:FolderList;Assembly=FolderList, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:SetCellValue;Assembly=SetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:DeleteFile;Assembly=DeleteFile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="2" TableName="ServersList" RowNumber="4" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>

 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="ServerName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Files_x0020_found" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>

 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%ServersList%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="ServersList" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"> <ns4:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount2%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns5:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%ServersList%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" ResultSetName="ServersList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns6:FolderList Password="" TimeInSeconds="0" HostName="%ServerName%" x:Name="folderList1" DisplayName="List Folder" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TimeSelection="00:00:00" Path="c:\*.mp3" Filter="0" TypeName="FolderList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" isRecursive="1" Condition="0" Timeout="00:05:00" UserName="" Description="List the contents of the specified folder." FilterSelection="False" MapDrive="True" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="NumberOfFiles" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%folderList1%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="folderList1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <ns7:SetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" ColNumber="2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" NewValue="%NumberOfFiles%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" VariableName="%ServersList%" x:Name="setNumber" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns4:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%NumberOfFiles%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns5:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="FileName" ColumnNumber="3" ResultSet="%folderList1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="folderList1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns8:DeleteFile IsValid="True" x:Name="deleteFile1" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Delete File" Path="%FileName%" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Delete the selected file." HostId="-2" TypeName="DeleteFile" UserName="" /> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <ns2:ConvertToHTMLTable Value="%ServersList% " IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" /> <ns3:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Deleted MP3 Report" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 9.00.8112.16434"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P>%convertToHTMLTable1%</P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process retrieves a list of all MP3 files in a given directory, and deletes them.
